summary: Hunter\'s Abode is a player home along the path from Riverwood to Whiterun. It is primarily designed for hunter/archer characters and makes a perfect beginner home.
descriptionHtml:
Hunter\'s Abode is a player home along the path from Riverwood to Whiterun. It is primarily designed for hunter/archer characters and makes a perfect beginner home.
This is my first mod using the creation kit and is essentially a culmination of everything I\'ve learnt so far. The home is fully navmeshed so followers should be able to enter.

I plan to eventually have the house as a hub for different hunting quests with various traders in the area.
author: MattyGamble

files.name: Hunters Abode
files.changelogHtml: Navmesh quick fix. Working on permanent solution
